imdb.title: Fukigen na Mononokean
imdb.plot: The start of Hanae Ashiya's high school career has not been easy-he has spent all of the first week in the infirmary, and his inexplicable condition is only getting worse. The cause of his torment is the mysterious fuzzy creature ...

episodes.title: The Limb Screen
episodes.plot: Ashiya and Abeno get an urgent SOS from the Legislator and go to the Underworld to find out what he wants.

episodes.title: The Tail
episodes.plot: Ashiya meets a beast yokai on his way to the Executive's while Abeno, Shizuku, and the Legislator finish up their work.

episodes.title: Greetings
episodes.plot: Ashiya and Abeno host a yokai from the Underworld who wants to observe their school in the Mundane World.

episodes.title: The Mortar
episodes.plot: Yahiko brings a cute yokai, Kinako, home and they become fast friends. Kinako wants to stay with Yahiko, but she cannot stay in the Mundane World.

episodes.title: The Tiger
episodes.plot: Fuzzy's been taken by the Justice under suspicion of theft, but when Ashiya and Abeno try to get him back, they learn that that's not the whole story.

episodes.title: The Seedling
episodes.plot: Hanae has had a sixth sense about yôkais since he met the Executive. Haruitsuki tries to improve his sixth sense with Yahiko during the photography club lodging camp.

episodes.title: The Dabbler
episodes.plot: The Legislator visits Mononoke-an to apologize to Hanae for the Executive's attitude. He told them that he and the Executive had an agreement that Hanae can visit Kakuriyo conditionally.

episodes.title: The Removal
episodes.plot: Haruitsuki collapses after he made a yôkai's wish come true and sent her to Kakuriyo. Actually, he had finished a secret work at the request of the Executive.

episodes.title: The Shadow
episodes.plot: Hanae's mother Nara felt sick because of a yôkai. She gets energy back after Hanae pulls it apart from her back. She tells him that there were some incidents like this with Hanae's father Sakae when they were young.

episodes.title: The Message
episodes.plot: Yahiko came to the annual festival in high school after Zenko. Haruitsuki takes him out to a mountain to play hide and seek, because Yahiko plays pranks. And then, he gets a clue to Sakae from Yahiko.

episodes.title: The Return
episodes.plot: Haruitsuki and Hanae have to send bird-like yôkai brothers to Kakuriyo at the request of their foster mother Komon, however, the youngest brother has never flown.

episodes.title: The Cobweb
episodes.plot: Haruitsuki sneaks into the Justice's storage warehouse to search for pieces of information about Sakae. Meanwhile, Yahiko tells Hanae that he knew Sakae.

episodes.title: True Intentions
episodes.plot: When Haruitsuki arrived at a shrine, Hanae is possessed by a spider-like yôkai Sasa. She has been sealed by Sakae, that's why she gets mad at Haruitsuki for having golden eyes and golden hair just like him.

episodes.title: Yakushi
episodes.plot: A high school boy Hanae Ashiya is getting worse after being possessed with a fluffy yôkai. When he finds a notice that an exorcist Haruitsuki Abe-no wants an assistant, he calls the exorcist to ask for help.

episodes.title: Gigi
episodes.plot: Hanae starts to work as Haruitsuki's assistant. Haruitsuki gives an order that Hanae always prevents not to see yôkais except for their client, but he can't.

episodes.title: Zenko
episodes.plot: After making friends with his classmates Saga and Fushimi, Ashiya embarks on the high school life of his dreams. But before he has the chance to enjoy his new life, he's instructed to go to a temple alone to find and return a yokai's lost possession.

episodes.title: Kakuriyo
episodes.plot: Haruitsuki goes to a pharmacy Kiyakudou in Kakuriyo with Hanae, and he forbids Hanae to go around in alone. But, Hanae follows a figure like Fuzzy because it bleeds.

episodes.title: Houchi
episodes.plot: The Legislator left a message for Haruitsuki. He intended to scold him for recruiting a human without a report. When he listens to Hanae's family name, he changes his mind.

episodes.title: Ringu
episodes.plot: At the request of a yôkai, Haruitsuki and Hanae have to find the ring which an old woman has lost, and deliver it to her.

episodes.title: Housou
episodes.plot: Zenko has been seeing yôkais since she got bitten by an animal. She asks Hanae and Haruitsuki for their advice at school, then, the animal like a fox appears at the front of them.

episodes.title: Mano
episodes.plot: Yahiko's misunderstanding about Haruitsuki went away, and he decided to work at Zenko's temple for compensation. After that, Hanae comes across a yôkai like a little bird on the way home.

episodes.title: Kakudan
episodes.plot: It's unusual for Haruitsuki to undertake a work at human-side request. The client, a school girl watches with unconcealed curiosity to Haruitsuki and Hanae. And her mother makes a great fuss that it's unscientific what they are saying.

episodes.title: Deku
episodes.plot: Zenko called Hanae and Haruitsuki because Yahiko's body got bigger suddenly. Yahiko told them that it's because he snuck a bite of potato that her mother harvested. They go to the field, and then they find a yôkai like a scarecrow.

episodes.title: Shiyou
episodes.plot: Haruitsuki and Hanae send a visually impaired yôkai, Tomori, to Kakuriyo at the request from Okina who is worshipped at a shrine. She wants to see Mundane World only once again, so Hanae lends his sight to her instead of not seeing yôkais for several days.

episodes.title: Youri
episodes.plot: Haruitsuki visited the Legislator to report that he fired Hanae. After that, he meets Big Boss Scree and children again, he tells them Hanae might have lost his ability.

episodes.title: Danen
episodes.plot: Haruitsuki thinks out a plan for recovering Hanae's ability. Meanwhile, Hanae is worried that Haruitsuki stayed away from school for several days.
